name: 黄欢
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的一年级（2025年-至今）博士研究生，是从张鼎文教授，我的研究兴趣包括轨迹预测、3D视觉。
bio_en: I am currently a first-year (2025-Now) Ph. D. student in the School of Automation at Northwestern Polytechnical University , supervised by Prof. Dingwen Zhang. My research interests include Trajectory Prediction and  3D Vision.
